titleStmt.title: A fruitfull sermon, on 1 Cor. 15. 18, 19. VVritten by VVilliam Pemble of Magdalen Hall in Oxford
titleStmt.author: Pemble, William, 1592?-1623.
Capel, Richard, 1586-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Y[oung] for Iohn Bartlet, at the signe of the gilt-Cup in Cheapeside,
